title: Fence Maker

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-  If a player is in multiple sets of fences, the person attacking them must be in all their fences to bypass the Fence Maker's protection.
-  Dead players' houses are considered non-existent to the Fence Maker because corpses don't get land owning rights.

desc:
Post 2519
_**Fence** is the best Defense. Keep that in mind._
Abilities:
-  Select three targets adjacent to each other and create a fence around their houses. They will each be protected with Powerful Defense for two attacks collectively. However, if the player attacking them is also in the fence, the Powerful Defense won't apply. [3 uses]
